name: Fridges of the Pacific Northwest
description:
Fridges of the Pacific Northwest is a space exploration game showcasing real-life workplace refrigerators from the Pacific Northwest.
Fridges of the Pacific Northwest started as a photojournalism project highlighting different workplace refrigerators in early 2016. The project was initiated by A. Constant and several other paid photojournalists to capture what workplace fridges across the Pacific Northwest look like. Over 100 photographs of refrigerators were collected from Pacific Northwest corporations, hospitals, government agencies, and colleges. Most of the fridges were selected to be showcased in the game.
A majority of the fridges featured come from Seattle, WA and Tacoma, WA. Other notable locations include Portland, OR, Vancouver, BC, and Bellingham, WA. Controls:
[wasd/arrow] move
[mouse] look
[left click] open
[right click] close
[esc] close game Fridge Photos - A. Constant and others
Music - Jimi Jaxon
Head of Disco Droppings and 7 Deadly Records
Live on Hollow Earth Radio Thursdays 5-7PM
